typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		metadata_storage_content_type as string,
		metadata_storage_size as string,
		metadata_storage_last_modified as string,
		metadata_storage_content_md5 as string,
		metadata_storage_name as string,
		metadata_storage_path as string,
		metadata_content_type as string,
		metadata_language as string,
		metadata_author as string,
		metadata_title as string,
		metadata_creation_date as string,
		merged_content as string,
		pages as (Entities as (Entity as string, EntitySubType as string, EntityType as string, Url as string)[], keyPhrases as string[], Page as string)[],
		Images as (Images as (height as string, imgdata as (width as string, height as string, originalWidth as string, originalHeight as string, rotationFromOriginal as string, contentOffset as string, pageNumber as string, contentType as string), originalHeight as string, originalWidth as string, tags as (confidence as double, hint as string, name as string)[], text as string, width as string), layoutText as (language as string, text as string, lines as (boundingBox as (x as string, y as string)[], text as string)[], words as (boundingBox as (x as string, y as string)[], text as string)[]))[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CogSearchProjections
CogSearchProjections keyGenerate(output(DocumentId as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> DocumentKey
DocumentKey select(mapColumn(
		DocumentId,
		metadata_storage_content_type,
		metadata_storage_size,
		metadata_storage_last_modified,
		metadata_storage_content_md5,
		metadata_storage_name,
		metadata_storage_path,
		metadata_content_type,
		metadata_language,
		metadata_author,
		metadata_title,
		metadata_creation_date,
		merged_content
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDocs
DocumentKey foldDown(unroll(pages),
	mapColumn(
		metadata_storage_name = metadata_storage_name,
		DocumentId,
		Page = pages.Page
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenPages
TestActivity select(mapColumn(
		metadata_storage_name,
		DocumentId,
		Page
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
FlattenPages keyGenerate(output(GeneratedId as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> TestActivity
SelectDocs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DocumentSink
